name: Quick Jumps!
description:
Simply tap to jump as soon as you land. Make sure you time your jump perfectly and see how far can you go!
Collect diamonds and complete missions to unlock new fun characters to play with.

◉ 25+ characters to collect
◉ 4 extra game modes
◉ 60+ challenges to complete
◉ Compete for the top-score on Game Center leaderboards
